title: Student Data
question_text:
On the first day of school, a statistics teacher collects data from his $150$ students to use throughout the school year. He collects data on the following topics:
$$\text{Height}$$
$$\text{Favorite Class}$$
$$\text{Amount of Sleep Last Night}$$
$$\text{Eye Color}$$
Which of the following would not be considered a variable?
solution:
In statistics, a variable is a characteristics that changes from one individual to another. We collect information on variables from subjects.

In this problem, data was collected from our subjects, the $150$ students, on the following variables: height, eye color, amount of sleep last night, and eye color.

Choice 'A' is correct.
